title: Bitcoin soars close to $13,000, hitting a 17-month high
text: Bitcoin surged as high as $12,919 in early morning trade Wednesday, to its highest level since January 2018.

title: Mnuchin: 'We were about 90% of the way' on China trade deal and there's a 'path to complete this'
text: Mnuchin tells CNBC he's confident President Trump and China's Xi Jinping can make progress in stalled trade talks.
